successes.title: OwnPhones: Wireless, Custom-Fit, 3D Printed Earbuds
successes.description: OwnPhones - The World's First 3D Printed Wireless Earbuds Custom Fitted to Your Ears and Perfectly Designed to Match Your Personality

Pledges.description: THE "OWNPHONES FIT" EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: a set of your own custom made 3D printed earbuds. As an early bird, you will be among the first 1000 people in the world to wear one. Your support is very appreciated and a huge help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality. We can only offer a limited amount at this amazing value. Suggested retail price $299!

THE "OWNPHONES DESIGNER FIT" EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: a set of your own custom designed and made 3D printed earbuds. Choose any style and design to add that personal look and make your earbuds a fashion accessory. As an early bird, you will be among the first 1000 people in the world to wear one. Your support is very appreciated and a huge help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality. We have a very limited amount of this must have fashionable designer earbud. Suggested retail price $349!

THE "OWNPHONES SMARTFIT" EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: a set of your own custom made 3D printed SMARTFIT earbuds. Featuring Advanced SoundScaping Control you can choose from many different designs. As an early bird, you will be among the first 1000 people in the world to wear one. Your support is very appreciated and a huge help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality. We have a very limited amount at this amazing value. Suggested retail price $399!

OWNPHONES FIT: we will custom make your very own personal 3D printed wireless earbuds with everything that makes an OwnPhones earbud Special including Custom Fit, Versatile Advantage and Tru-Wireless features. Retail Value $299.

MORE “SMARTFIT" EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Wow what a response! Due to popular demand, we’re adding an extra Early Bird special for a custom made, 3D printed SMARTFIT earbuds. Featuring Advanced SoundScaping Control, OwnStatus (optional) and real world notifications, you can have the earbuds of your dreams. With many different designs to choose from, your buds can be made to match your personality. We appreciate your support and help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality. Suggested retail price $399!

MORE “SMARTFIT" EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Wow what a response! Due to popular demand, we’re adding an extra Early Bird special for a custom made, 3D printed SMARTFIT earbuds. Featuring Advanced SoundScaping Control, OwnStatus (optional) and real world notifications, you can have the earbuds of your dreams. With many different designs to choose from, your buds can be made to match your personality. We appreciate your support and help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality. Suggested retail price $399!

OWNPHONES DESIGNER FIT: Your own custom designed and made 3D printed OnwPhones. Choose any style and design to add that personal look and make your earbuds a fashion accessory. Suggested retail price $349!

OWNPHONES JEWELRY COLLECTION: a set of your own custom designed and made 3D printed earbuds. Choose your design from a mutlitude of gorgeous pieces, from silver, bronze, brass, gold plating. Your support is very appreciated and a huge help in making our dream for OwnPhones a reality.  Suggested retail price $349!
OWNPHONES SMART FIT: Your own custom made 3D printed SMARTFIT earbuds. Featuring Advanced SoundScaping Control you can chose from many different designs. Suggested retail price $399!

JOIN THE OWNPHONES DESIGNER PROGRAM: You can design your own OwnPhones earbuds and will have early access to the Beta program to offer your designs for sale as soon as our online store goes live (Price includes one pair of your design and 1 year membership).

OWNPHONES BRAND PROGRAM: You can design a custom branded OwnPhones earbuds in your own brand look and style. Plus, when you join our Brand Designer Program you can put your branded earbuds for sale on the OwnPhones online store.

YOU PLAY DESIGNER: We'll schedule a 2 hour consulting video call for you and one of our designers to go over your concept for a design, show us your inspiration and help us create something that is truely unique to your personality and style with our modelers.
THE GOLD PACKAGE: Choose any design from our OwnPhones Gold Collection we'll make it out of 18k gold and turn it into a beautiful, golden sound experience.

LIMITED EDITION ON-SITE DESIGN SESSION: Stop by our design studio in San Diego and have our designers work with you to dream up, design and build your OwnPhones. Includes 2 night's stay at 5-star hotel in San Diego.
THE ULTIMATE MUSIC FASHION ACCESSORY: We commission a local Artist who will meet with you and custom design a Gold & Diamond studded fashion earbud according to your tastes.
